price: ¿No le han informado de lo que contienen las páginas reveladas a Moisés
arabic: أَمۡ لَمۡ يُنَبَّأۡ بِمَا فِي صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: am lam yunabba bimā fī ṣuḥufi mūsā
